ListFormClosing.HTML:
<SCRIPT>
function OnLoadWrapper()
{
    if (null != document.all.onetidApproved)
    {
        frm.InitFormFields();
        document.all.onetidApproved.focus();
    }
    else
       frm.SetFirstFocus();
}
if (browseris.ie4up) 
{
    document.body.onload = OnLoadWrapper;
}
else 
{
    frm.SetFirstFocus();
}
</SCRIPT>

ListFormClosing.HTML:
<SCRIPT>
function OnLoadWrapper()
{
    frm.SetFirstFocus();
}
if (browseris.ie4up)
{
    document.body.onload = OnLoadWrapper;
}
else
{
  frm.SetFirstFocus();
}
</SCRIPT>
